pages.text: Aha! While mining deep underground, I found an enormous geode crackling with energy, energy pressing against my skull and my thoughts. This $(0)must/$ be the place spoken about in legends where media accumulates.$(br2)These amethyst crystals must be a $(thing)convenient, solidified form of Media/$.

It appears that, in addition to the $(item)Amethyst Shards/$ I may be used to, these crystals also drop $(item)Amethyst Dust/$ or $(item)Charged Amethyst Crystals/$. It looks like I'll have a better chance of finding a crystal cluster with a $(item)Charged Amethyst Crystal/$ in it by using a Fortune pickaxe.

Connections are flashing wildly in my mind as I take the beauty of the geode in. It's like the media in the air is entering me, empoweing me, elucidating me ... It feels wonderful.$(br2)I suppose this is where my study into the arcane starts to make any kind of sense! Let me study those old legends again now that I know what I'm looking at.
